TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityToken extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用于实现所有安全令牌的基类。

span.span: Represents a base class used to implement all security tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用安全令牌可提供身份验证凭据，也可以保护消息。Use a security token to provide authentication credentials or to protect a message. 安全令牌可以是用于提供身份验证凭据，加密密钥材料，或者，在安全令牌的情况下颁发安全令牌服务 (STS) 的有关主题的声明集合。A security token can be used to provide authentication credentials, cryptographic key material, or, in the case of a security token issued by a security token service (STS), a collection of claims about a subject. 所有安全令牌都派生类。All security tokens derive from the class. 从.NET 4.5 开始，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 完全集成到.NET Framework 和 WIF 公开的类是处理你的代码中的安全令牌的首选的方法。Beginning with .NET 4.5, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) has been fully integrated into the .NET Framework and the classes exposed by WIF are the preferred method of handling security tokens in your code. WIF，安全令牌进行序列化和反序列化到和从其 XML 表示形式是验证和使用的类派生自基类。In WIF, security tokens are serialized and deserialized to and from their XML representation and are validated by using classes derived from the base class. 验证令牌不只确保该令牌是否有效，但还返回涉及的令牌中的可以进行身份验证和授权决策中使用的实例。Validating a token involves not just ensuring that the token is valid, but also returning a instance from the token that can be used in making authentication and authorization decisions. 的令牌处理程序的实现通过构造从如也一样是固有的令牌的声明类型本身的令牌中包含的声明的方法。The is constructed by the token handler’s implementation of the method from the claims contained in the token as well as from claims that are intrinsic to the token type itself. WIF 附带了对以下类型的安全令牌的支持：WIF ships with support for the following types of security tokens: - ： 表示基于 SAML 2.0 断言的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based upon a SAML 2.0 Assertion. 此标记的类型通常由安全令牌服务响应的 WS 信任和 WS 联合身份验证安全令牌请求 (RST) 颁发。This token type is typically issued by a security token service in response to a WS-Trust or WS-Federation security token request (RST). - ： 表示基于 SAML 1.1 断言的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based upon a SAML 1.1 Assertion. 此标记的类型通常由安全令牌服务响应的 WS 信任和 WS 联合身份验证安全令牌请求 (RST) 颁发。This token type is typically issued by a security token service in response to a WS-Trust or WS-Federation security token request (RST). - 和： 表示基于 Kerberos 票证是接收或发送 SOAP 消息中的安全令牌 and : Represents a security token that is based upon a Kerberos ticket that is received or sent in a SOAP message - ： 表示基于使用 RSA 算法创建的密钥的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based upon key that is created using the RSA algorithm. - ： 表示安全令牌，其中包含有关会话的信息。: Represents a security token that contains information about a session. - ： 表示基于用户名和密码的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based on a username and password. - ： 表示基于 Windows 域或用户帐户的标识的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based on the identity of a Windows domain or user account. - ： 表示基于 X.509 证书的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based on an X.509 certificate. - ： 表示基于 X.509 证书映射到 Windows 域用户或本地计算机用户帐户的安全令牌。: Represents a security token that is based upon an X.509 certificate that is mapped to a Windows domain user or local computer user account. 其他两个安全令牌类，和，可以用于帮助处理一般情况。Two other security token classes, and , can be used to help handle general cases. 概括地说的安全令牌划分为三个主要类别：Broadly speaking security tokens fall into three major categories: - 令牌携带或引用加密密钥材料。Tokens that carry or reference cryptographic key material. 例如和类型通常用于此目的。For example the and types are often used for this purpose. - 标记，表示已经过身份验证的用户凭据。Tokens that represent credentials for users that have already been authenticated. 例如， ， ，并在使用证书身份验证的用户的情况下类型。For example, the , , and, in the case of a user authenticated using a certificate, the types. - 在使用的 WS 信任或 WS 联合身份验证协议的安全令牌请求的响应由安全令牌服务 (STS) 颁发的令牌。Tokens that are issued by a security token service (STS) in response to a security token request using either the WS-Trust or WS-Federation protocol. 中通常返回`wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse`XML 片段。These are typically returned in a `wst:RequestSecurityTokenResponse` XML fragment. 和类型通常用于表示这些令牌。The and types are most often used to represent these tokens. 一种特殊的令牌类型， ，包含在主动或被动方案中使用会话时重新创建主体所需的信息。A special token type, the , contains information necessary to recreate a principal when using sessions in active or passive scenarios. 若要将功能添加到现有令牌类型可以派生特定类型和其关联的令牌处理程序以支持您将添加到令牌的任何新元素。To add functionality to existing token types you can derive from the specific type and its associated token handler to support any new elements that you add to the token. 若要添加对新的令牌类型的支持，可以直接从派生类。To add support for new token types, you can derive directly from the class. 当执行此操作时，您还需要创建的令牌处理程序类派生自类。When you do this, you will also need to create a token handler class by deriving from the class. 根据你的令牌的方式使用，您可能还需要创建自定义令牌解析程序通过派生自通过从派生类也作为一个或多个自定义密钥标识符子句类型类。Depending on how your token is to be used, you may also need to create a custom token resolver by deriving from the class as well as one or more custom key identifier clause types by deriving from the class. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题取自`Custom Token`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的一个实现`SimpleWebToken`类和一个`SimpleWebTokenHandler`类，以及支持 SWT 令牌的其他类。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关在何处下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示如何实现`SimpleWebToken`类。The following code shows the implementation of the `SimpleWebToken` class. 此类扩展。This class extends . [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#2)]

span.para: 必须重写， ， ，和属性。， ， ，和方法都支持的类型的密钥标识符。必须重写这些方法以在派生类中支持其他密钥标识符类型。
You must override the , , , and properties. The , , , and methods all support key identifiers of type . You must override these methods to support other key identifier types in your derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，当安全令牌序列化为 XML 时，安全令牌的 `Id` 属性 (Attribute) 设置为 属性 (Property) 的值。Typically, when a security token is serialized into XML, the `Id` attribute for the security token is set to the value of the property. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题取自`Custom Token`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的一个实现`SimpleWebToken`类和一个`SimpleWebTokenHandler`类，以及支持 SWT 令牌的其他类。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关在何处下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的重写属性。The following code shows the override of the property. [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 可首先确定指定的密钥标识符子句是否与此实例相同。The method calls the to first determine whether the specified key identifier clause is the same as this instance. 默认实现返回的第一个元素集合如果集合不为空，并且如果返回`true`; 否则为它将返回`null`。The default implementation returns the first element of the collection if the collection is not empty and if returns `true`; otherwise, it returns `null`.

span.para: 继承自，并实现方法并不能为已解决，返回。不应从引发异常方法。
When you inherit from , and implement the method and cannot be resolved, return . An exception should not be thrown from the method.

summary.span: 获取与安全令牌相关联的加密密钥。

span.span: Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the security token.

value.span: 一个类型为 的 ，包含与安全令牌相关联的密钥集。

span.span: A of type that contains the set of keys associated with the security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性设置为此安全令牌来保护令牌或 SOAP 消息的加密密钥。Use the property to set the cryptographic keys for this security token to protect tokens or a SOAP message. 密钥可以用于，除此之外，数字签名或加密令牌或 SOAP 消息。The keys can be used, among other things, to digitally sign or encrypt either tokens or SOAP messages. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题取自`Custom Token`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的一个实现`SimpleWebToken`类和一个`SimpleWebTokenHandler`类，以及支持 SWT 令牌的其他类。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关在何处下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的重写属性。The following code shows the override of the property. [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 属性可确定 令牌有效的时间段。Use the and properties to determine the time period in which a token is valid. 和 属性分别表示此安全令牌有效的最初时刻和最后时刻。The and properties represent the first and last instants in time in which the security token is valid, respectively. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题取自`Custom Token`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的一个实现`SimpleWebToken`类和一个`SimpleWebTokenHandler`类，以及支持 SWT 令牌的其他类。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关在何处下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的重写属性。The following code shows the override of the property. [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#6)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#8)]

span.span: A that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 属性可确定 令牌有效的时间段。Use the and properties to determine the time period in which a token is valid. 和 属性分别表示此安全令牌有效的最初时刻和最后时刻。The and properties represent the first and last instants in time in which the security token is valid, respectively. ## Examples 在中使用的代码示例主题取自`Custom Token`示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了启用处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 它包含的一个实现`SimpleWebToken`类和一个`SimpleWebTokenHandler`类，以及支持 SWT 令牌的其他类。It includes an implementation of a `SimpleWebToken` class and a `SimpleWebTokenHandler` class, as well as other classes that support SWT tokens. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关在何处下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示的重写属性。The following code shows the override of the property. [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenconstants.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#7)] [!code-csharp[WifCustomTokenST#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokenst/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtoken.cs#8)]
